name: Civilization of the Unknown
description:
• You are a mummy awakened from a tomb by evil archaeologists when they tried to steal an old relic.
  • It’s your job to avenge your civilization.
  • There are humans with different types of attacks.
    • Stronger ones (bodyguards) will fight you.
    • Monster hunters will fight you from range.
    • Weaker ones will run away.
  • Since you are a big and durable zombie, you have the ability to whack people with your arm.
  • You also have a spell that you can cast at range, giving you i-frames.
